name: homeliness
content:
homeliness noun [U]
(PLAIN)
Add to word list
Add to word list
UK the quality of being simple or ordinary, but pleasant, in a way that makes you think of home: The farmhouse combines nostalgia and homeliness. I loved the warm homeliness of the story.
More examplesFewer examplesThe photographs of his wife and child add a nice touch of homeliness and familiarity.They left the luxury of midtown for the homeliness of the Midwest.It was a one-stop shop that combined the pleasure of consumption with the ideals of homeliness and simplicity.

(UGLY)

homely
